#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define rep(i,n) for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
#define ll  long long int
#define pi pair<int,int>
#define pii pair<ll,pi>
#define f first
#define mp make_pair
#define mod 1000000007
#define s second
#define pb push_back
ll pw[5111];
ll fact[5111];
ll ifact[5111];
ll bpow(ll x,ll n){
    ll ans=1;
    while(n>0){
        if(n&1) ans*=x;
        x*=x;
        ans%=mod;
        x%=mod;
        n/=2;
    }
    return ans;
}
ll C(int  n,int r){
    ll ret=fact[n];
    ret*=ifact[r];
    ret%=mod;
    ret*=ifact[n-r];
    ret%=mod;
    return ret;
}
int main(){
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    pw[0]=1;
    fact[0]=1;
    ifact[0]=1;
    for(ll i=1;i<=5001;i++){
        pw[i]=25LL*pw[i-1];
        pw[i]%=mod;
        fact[i]=i*fact[i-1];
        fact[i]%=mod;
        ifact[i]=bpow(fact[i],mod-2);
    }
    while(t--){
        int N;
        cin >> N;
        ll ans=0;
        for(int L=1;L<=N;L++){
            ll P=C(N,L);
            P*=P;
            P%=mod;
 
            ll R=26LL*pw[L-1];
            R%=mod;
            R*=P;
            R%=mod;
            ans+=R;
            ans%=mod;
        }
        cout<<ans<<"\n";
    }
}
